Roll20 One-pager Bookmarklet

Roll20 One-Pager Bookmarket

Ever got annoyed that you can't CTRL+F in a Roll20 forum because it's spread across a whole bunch of pages?

This bookmarklet brings the contents of an entire topic into the first page, for easy perusal!

To use, just click and drag the below bookmarklet to your bookmarks toolbar:

>>> Roll20 One-Pager <<<

Then, on the first page of any Roll20 forum, click it to load the contents of all other pages on that one page!

Note that this could significantly slow down your browser if you're running on older hardware - the forums are paged for a reason!
